name: [ALAN DURING] Hellevator
description:
Welcome to Hell...
...where sins taint the sinners' skin and the demons feed on the damned.

Amid the barren land, you wake up longing for the solace of your wife. But finding her ain't easy. Traverse the levels of hell through the Hellevator and fend off the wretched souls who attack you. 

Every decision shapes the future you witness. Will you atone for your past transgressions or will the Hellevator lead you to fate even worse than eternal damnation?

Features
  • Fight with your sword or your word. There's more than one way to fend off enemies. You may even witness different futures.
  • Transact with Gobu, the local merchant in Hell, to help you get material for your journey.
  • Immerse yourself in this dark and twisted narrative of love, loss, heartache, and redemption.
Credits
  • Hellevator is inspired by Undertale and Dante's Inferno.
  • UI SFX are done in https://sfxr.me/.
  • General SFX from Pixabay
  • Deltarune & Undertale Dialogue Bleeps.
  • NeXsard and Adam Haynes on Youtube  for Battle Music
  • OMORI,  UNDERTALE, DELTARUNE OST used on story scenes. 
  • Thank you for your wonderful music!
Libraries Used
  • Ncurses for rendering terminal GUI
  • SDL2 and SDL_Mixer for playing sound effects and music
  • SQLite for storing game data
  • Pthread for multithreading operations 

Content Warning: May contain references to emotional abuse and suicide. Play at your own discretion.

Developed by Alan During

Since the real A. Turing is dead,
we decided to B the next best thing. C?
